charges.charge_description: THEFT OR RECEIPT OF STOLEN MAIL MATTER(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is committed to the BOP for 33 months on Ct 1; followed by 3 yrs supv rel on Ct 1. No fine. $100 MPA. Rest in the amount of $23,454.93. Spec Cond: Not incur new credit charges or open addt'l lines of credit w/o prior approval; dft shall provide the probation officer access to any req financial info; dft shall satisfy all warrants and or pending charges w/in first 60 days of supv rel; dft shall submit to a reasonable search, warn others; dft shall succ part in any substance abuse cnsl prog, may include testing; rpt w/in 72 hrs of rel; succ part in any mental hlth cnsl prog; pay any rest bal during the first 30 mkotnhs of supv; shall not possess or use a credit card; shall not possess, own or use a computer excep tat her palce of employemtn w/prior approval of probation office; court recommends dft be given credit for time served; upon oral mtn of gov't Cts 2,3 are dismissed. Dft advised of right to appeal. Dft remanded to custody of the USM
Dismissed upon oral mtn of gov't
